casebody.data:
Mary DOE et al.
v.
DEPARTMENT OF MENTAL HEALTH AND ADDICTION SERVICES et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided June 5, 2019

Lisa M. Vincent, in support of the petition.

Ralph E. Urban, assistant attorney general, in opposition.

The plaintiffs' petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, *660188 Conn. App. 275, 204 A.3d 1230 (2019), is denied.
